text: Got an email this morning that says its National IPA day today, i guess i will have to celebrate later
im going to oskar blues and sierra nevada new breweries in nc this weekend
i wanna see big operations like that, that have opened their new regional breweing centers
i heard thats a good brew area
yeah big breweries have opened stuff there
its funny NC = oregon landscape wise
all the lakes and waterfalls have same names as here
ha, strange. My sister was there for a number of years, finally moved back to michigan.

I brought in a bottle of my sour, in the orange fridge, ready to try. If we open it have to pour the whole thing into something to pour from there is quite a layer of yeast and sediment in this one. But oh so good
you are out tomorrow right? we can try it tonight.
thats cool of you.  im only good for a taste cuz i got a drive ahead of me.  dont want you to open bottle just for a taste.  so if no one else is around, save til next week?
you wouldnt want more than a taste anyways, its a sour, so yeah sour
its a 22oz if there are people that want to try it cool. but sure dont want to open the large one to pour a small bit
